title: Marine marvels
creator_credit: Mushir Ahmad, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: Survey of sea animals and creatures in the water surrounding the Indian sub-continent. An early focus is on their use for human consumption and footage appear to have been filmed in aquaria.
